name: milk
description: milk is used to serve beemo's archives or logs.
author: BeemoBot

scripts.build: npm run clean:win && npm run clean:lin && tsc
scripts.clean: npm run clean:win && npm run clean:lin
scripts.clean:win: node -e "if (process.platform === 'win32') process.exit(1)" || , if exist dist rmdir /Q /S dist
